code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import AlertContext from'../../context/alert/alertContext';import{faPhone,faCalendarAlt,faCircle}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';var Alerts=function Alerts(){var alertContext=useContext(AlertContext);var alerts=alertContext.alerts;return alerts.length>0&&alerts.map(function(alert){return React.createElement("div",{key:alert.id,className:"alert alert-".concat(alert.type)},React.createElement(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faCircle})," ",alert.msg);});};export default Alerts;
